meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of leptons.
meanings.sent1: The leptonic particle was very small.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study leptonic properties to understand subatomic particles.
meanings.sent3: The leptonic dance of the electrons was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her leptonic movements through the crowd were swift and graceful.
meanings.sent5: The leptonic nature of the tiny particle made it hard to detect.

meanings.sent1: The leptonic field contained many different particles.
meanings.sent2: The leptonic interactions play a crucial role in particle physics.
meanings.sent3: The leptonic soup was a strange mix of flavors.
meanings.sent4: His leptonic mind was filled with thoughts of the subatomic world.
meanings.sent5: The leptonic composition of the material was key to its behavior.
